      • createSubscription

        protected Subscription createSubscription(MailboxSession session,
                              String mailbox)
        Description copied from class: StoreSubscriptionManager
        Create Subscription for the given user and mailbox. By default a SimpleSubscription will get returned. If you need something more special just override this method
